H0.text: The UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’ is set during which war. The Crimean War

H1.text: The UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’ is set during which war. The Boer War

H2.text: The UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’ is set during which war. The Napoleonic Wars

H3.text: The UK television series ‘Blackadder Goes Forth’ is set during which war. WW1
